threshold_minutes.description: Minimum delay in minutes required for auto-payout eligibility.

DelayRule.class_description: Policy delay rule specifying the minimum delay for auto-payout eligibility.

eligible_for_auto_payout.description: Indicates if the claim is eligible for auto-payout ('yes' or 'no').

delay_minutes.description: Total delay in minutes between scheduled and actual arrival.

suggested_payout_euros.description: Suggested payout amount in euros based on the delay and policy.

reason.description: Explanation for eligibility decision, including delay and threshold details.

EligibilityResult.class_description: Eligibility result for the travel delay claim.

flight_departure_datetime.description: Scheduled flight departure datetime in ISO-8601 format.

flight_arrival_datetime.description: Scheduled flight arrival datetime in ISO-8601 format.

actual_arrival_datetime.description: Actual flight arrival datetime in ISO-8601 format.

delay_rule.description: Policy delay rule specifying the minimum delay for auto-payout eligibility.

customer_policy_id.description: Optional customer policy ID for confidence scoring or tracking.

TravelDelayClaimInput.class_description: Input data for the travel delay claim.

input_data.description: Input data for the travel delay claim.

eligibility_result.description: Eligibility result for the travel delay claim.

TravelDelayClaimMaster.class_description: Master aggregation class for travel delay claim processing, combining input data and eligibility result.
